bill.title: Voting System Equipment; Procurement
bill.description: Establishes an alternative public procurement process for the procurement of voting system equipment. Effective upon approval and repealed on June 30, 2011.

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 1
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 01-22-10 2:00 pm in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Cabanilla, McKelvey, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Wakai, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, Luke; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes, Mizuno, Morita.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 11-10) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and McKelvey, Sagum, Wooley excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-05-10 1:30pm in House conference room 308.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-09-10, 1:30 pm.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-09-10 1:30 PM in conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Brower, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, C. Lee, Nishimoto, Sagum, Tokioka, Wooley, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Finnegan, Ward; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 412-10) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Thursday, 02-18-10.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Berg, Souki excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 34).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JGO, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO has scheduled a public hearing on 03-12-10 9:30AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JGO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JGO were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Takamine, Bunda, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.
(S) Reported from JGO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2787) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-31-10 9:30AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Tsutsui, Chun Oakland, English, Fukunaga, Galuteria, Kidani, Kokubun, Tokuda, Hemmings; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Hooser ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Hee.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3034) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-06-10.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Hooser, Ihara, Kim . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 411) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 462).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Taniguchi, Chair; Kim, Co-Chair(s); Hemmings.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 535).
